TopicTitle: Does anyone know anything about HyperEdit of Kronal Vessel Viewer?

Articles.Content:
I hope this is the right place for such queries, but I wonder if anyone has any information about HyperEdit since the last KSP update? I have relied on it to test things, but it has vanished. I'm a massive fan of Kronal Vessel Viewer too, if anyone knows about that.

Thanks in advance for any help.

Define vansished.

I know hyper worked in 1.4.0 and fairly certain in  1.4.1 

KVV worked in 1.4.0

I did have to hack the version control bits  of one of the files of both though.
